name: Bureau Brussels
goal:
The team at Bureau Brussels helps in managing key relationships in the regulatory process by:
scanning the horizon, drafting an agenda,
building issue-driven alliances, positioning executives in key networks, and thus assisting in maintaining the licence to operate.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: European Accessibility Act, Tax Intermediaries, Regulation on cross-border fees, Sales on Online Goods and Distant Sales
